tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview:
You are right, I missed the nigger. He is a racist.
Oh well, Obama still sucks.﻿

Who got USA involved in WWI, WWII, Korean War, Vietnam War? ANSWER: Woodrow Wilson (Liberal), FDR (Liberal), Harry Truman (Liberal), JFK (Liberal), Lyndon Johnson (LBJ) I think you need to﻿ learn history!!!!!!!
So I guess, for the first time 80% of the world agrees on﻿ something :)

yeah what the gop tries to hide is that reagan raised taxes a dozen times to make up for windfalls in government revenue -﻿ the us isnt 16 trillion in debt to China, the president has no power over gas prices - which most republican halfwits use the sharply decreased prices before Obama took office, and you can thank supply-side economics and deregulation of the financial industry for the poor state the American economy is in
go listen to mccain's and rice's speeches at the rnc, they want war and romney being the spineless puppet he﻿ is is going to oblige

No I mean babies, you can hide murder under cute euphemism (i,e. woman's right to choose, woman's health issue, affordable health care act, progressive, learning moment,﻿ undocumented worker etc. etc. etc.) you are not fooling anyone!!!!

"All you have to﻿ guide you are your value and your vision and your life experiences that make you who you are". 10:05-10:11. This is how our president makes all his decisions. 9:46-9:50 "no amount of data or numbers will get you to the right answer." This is why our economy is going to hell.

3,0000 Americans where killed in America before lunch on Sept 11, 2001 - That is why the USA when to war!!! Don't be an idiot!!!!! If the UN upheld there own﻿ resolutions and did not have corrupt UN members that secretly supported Iraq's dictator and took bribes from the oil for food program, the Iraq war would have not happened!!!
because he was elected president﻿ after people realised how increasingly mentally deranged republican proposals were/are becoming

You should keep up on things better.﻿ What I explained to you is common knowledge.
Hope you're not old enough to vote, you are very ignorant.

0:54 black post thing few feet away from her at between one and two o'clock (hopefully you'll know how that works). On top of that is a little rectangle of smoked glass. That's the teleprompter.
Moron.﻿
probably﻿ to write it off for a tax break =-=#

He invaded Iraq because at the time (not in hindsight) it was thought Hussain had WMD's and 99.9% of the democrats were on board with that including the Clintons.
And when he invaded Iraq the Iraqi's decided to fight back - so a lot of them got killed.
That is what happens﻿ when you defy the US military - you die.

LOL﻿ at all these tools saying how pretty she looks. This vile cunt looks like a real vine swinger that escaped from the Chicago Zoo and got drugged by a few tranquilizer darts while making an escape.
if so why﻿ didn't obama go there and leave us go forward adamjsutto12 are you really a kool aid drinker
Obama doesn't care about you. All she cares about is convincing everyone that she﻿ cares about them.

The govt is always trying to make sure each party is happy, dems feelin like their balls are a lil small "oh it's fine. I like it this way." secretly they cower in shame. Rep " Omg Becky Look at his BALLS! Huge! Damn straight." aaannnnddd I have no idea where I'm goin﻿ with this
and﻿ besides the point romney give more charity than obama and biden combined
Why did he kill millions of innocent iraqis﻿ ahole you answer for him

3,0000 Americans where killed in America before lunch on Sept 11, 2001 - That is why the USA when to war!!! Don't be an idiot!!!!! If the UN upheld their own resolutions and did not have corrupt UN members that secretly supported Iraq's dictator and took﻿ bribes from the oil﻿ for food program, the Iraq war would have not happened!!!
Us Canadians would love to see Obama wins the white house again his the best president you guys have in America right﻿ now please vote Obama again.
I live in England and i remember miss obama came to speak to us about life and stuff. ever since then i loved﻿ them. Because american president bush and his wife never even came to our schools
WhooooHoooo!﻿ The humans are winning! Greatest first Lady ever!
